prompts.name: claude-code-inference
prompts.description: Route complex AI tasks to Claude Code via the unified backend — agentic code generation, refactoring, prompt engineering, and multi-step reasoning

prompts.name: dashboard-sync
prompts.description: Refresh SLATE dashboard data, broadcast system status, and sync project board state

prompts.name: deploy-kubernetes
prompts.description: Deploy SLATE to Kubernetes cluster using Kustomize overlays or Helm

prompts.name: forge-collab
prompts.description: Meta-prompt for AI-to-AI collaboration — coordinate Copilot and Antigravity via FORGE.md, Docker volumes, and MCP

prompts.name: issue-to-task
prompts.description: Transform a GitHub issue into a local Ollama-routed task that produces an automated PR with code changes

prompts.name: pr-review
prompts.description: Automated local code review of PR diffs using slate-coder and slate-planner via Ollama

prompts.name: run-benchmarks
prompts.description: Execute comprehensive GPU and inference benchmarks for SLATE

prompts.name: system-health
prompts.description: Check SLATE system health including GPU, services, Kubernetes, and workflow status

prompts.name: task-router
prompts.description: Classify and route incoming tasks to the correct SLATE agent using Ollama for intent detection

prompts.name: workflow-cleanup
prompts.description: Clean up stale tasks, enforce completion rules, and maintain workflow health
